trans-unit.source: Defines an individual endpoint contained in the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 定義包含於 XML Web Service 中的個別端點。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies a single address (URI) for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>, which defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a given <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會指定單一位址 (URI) 為<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>，這會定義作業的訊息格式和通訊協定詳細資料和訊息的給定<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A> property gets or sets those values for a specified `Port`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A>屬性取得或設定針對指定這些值`Port`。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<port>` element, which is enclosed by the `<service>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會對應至 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL)`<port>`元素，其以`<service>`項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl。

trans-unit.source: The following examples creates a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port> and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service.Ports%2A> collection of an existing <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> named `myDescription`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port>並將它加入<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service.Ports%2A>的現有集合<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>名為`myDescription`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the XML <see langword="<binding>" /> attribute of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> 的 XML <see langword="<binding>" /> 屬性 (Attribute) 值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the XML binding.
A binding defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.
trans-unit.target: 定義作業的訊息格式和通訊協定詳細資料與訊息的繫結<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets those values for a specific `Port`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性取得或設定這些值的特定`Port`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> 相關聯擴充性項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of extensibility elements associated with the port.
trans-unit.target: 與通訊埠相關聯的擴充性項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" /> of which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" />，<see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> 為其中的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" /> of which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Port" /> is a member.
